channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Temporary speed normal speed, 27th August
item.description:
Normal speed not covered over
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Court Road, Brockworth

item.title: Mattress dumped, 27th August
item.description:
Mattress has been left on the green opposite houses, this has been left here over a week with no signs of moving. This needs to be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Boundary Cottages Astridge Road, Witcombe

item.title: Broken glass on Everest road, 27th August
item.description:
There are two spots of broken glass on this road; one by the shop and the other by the roadworks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 281 Old Bath Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Multiple large potholes (10cm deep, 20-30cm across) - getting worse, 27th August
item.description:
Potholes are increasing in number and severity. Increasingly dangerous and hard to avoid for cyclists turning right from Shurdington Rd into Moorend Park Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Waterford Court Moorend Park Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus stop post hit by vehicle, 27th August
item.description:
The bus stop on Hales Road near the Grove is leaning at 45 degrees as it has been hit by a vehicle of some description
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 129 Hale's Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Manhole cover protruding in road, 25th August
item.description:
Manhole cover in left lane approaching railway bridge is protruding way above the road tarmac which appears to have sunk around it, creating a hump hazard for vehicles as it is not immediately visible until you are right on top of it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hyde Cottages Hyde Lane, Swindon Village

item.title: New Barn Lane trees overhanging pavement, 24th August
item.description:
There are trees & brambles growing over a wall and hanging low over the pavement on New Barn Lane making it difficult for pedestrians use the pavement. Located on south side of road opposite nos. 199 & 201.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Laurel Drive, Cheltenham

item.title: Straw on pavemwnts and in gutters, 24th August

item.title: Private Hedge overgrown footpath, 24th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Parr Close, Churchdown

item.title: No street lights, 23rd August
item.description:

item.title: Dangerous Road Surface Pittville Circus Road 3, 23rd August
item.description:
This has been previously reported, recent inspection from the council says thar this is perfectly safe. I would suggest that the inspection revisits and makes a second inspection. This Road surface is dangerous and should not be ignored by the County council.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Circus Day Nursery Pittville Circus Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous Road Surface Pittville Circus 2, 23rd August
item.description:
This has been previously reported and again has been ignored by the County council. This is a serious hazard to cyclists the negligence of the council could result in a serious or fatal accident.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): North Hall Pittville Circus Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Dangerous Road Surface Pittville Circus 1, 23rd August
item.description:
This dangerous pot holes has been reported previously but has been ignored by the council. It needs urgent attention before a cyclist is hurt or killed due to the County Council negligence

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): North Hall Pittville Circus Road, Cheltenham
